analyzed: sūtra pāṭhaḥ
samyak jñāna pūrvikā sarva puruṣa artha siddhiḥ iti tat vayutpādayate
pratyakṣam
anumānam ca iti
tatra pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍham abhrāntam
tayā rahitam timira āśu bhramaṇa nau yāna sambhrama ādi an āhita vibhramam jñānam pratyakṣam
tat caturvidham
sva viṣaya anantara viṣaya sahakāriṇā indriya jñānena samanantara pratyayena janitam tat manaḥ vijñānam
sarva citta caittānām ātma saṃvedanam
bhūta artha bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta jam yogi jñānam ca iti
tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam
yasya arthasya sannidhāna asannidhānābhyām jñāna pratibhāsa bhedaḥ tat svalakṣaṇam
tat eva paramārtha sat
anyat sāmānya lakṣaṇam
saḥ numānasya viṣayaḥ
ca pratyakṣam jñānam pramāṇa phalam
artha pratīti rūpa tvāt
artha sārūpyam asya pramāṇam
tad vaśāt artha pratīti siddhar eti
iti prathamaḥ pratyakṣa paricchedaḥ
anumānam dvidhā
sva artha para artha ca

original: 2/3 tatra svārtha trirūpālliṅgād yadanumeye jñānaṃ tadanumānam /
analyzed: tatra svārtha tri rūpāt liṅgāt yat anumeye jñānam tat anumānam
trairūpyam punar liṅgasya anumeye sattvam eva
sapakṣaḥ eva sattvam
a sapakṣe ca asattvam eva niścitam
anumeyaḥ tra jijñāsita viśeṣaḥ dharmī
sādhya dharma sāmānyena samānaḥ rthaḥ sapakṣa
na sapakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ
tatas nyaḥ tad viruddhaḥ tad abhāvaḥ ca iti
tri rūpāṇi ca trīṇi eva liṅgāni
anupalabdhiḥ svabhāvaḥ kārya ca iti
tatra anupalabdhiḥ yathā na pradeśa viśeṣe kvacid ghaṭaḥ
upalabdhi kṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdheḥ iti
upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptiḥ rūpa lambha pratyaya antara sākalyam svabhāva viśeṣaḥ ca

original: 2/14 yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsvanyeṣūṣalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavati,
analyzed: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsu anyeṣu uṣalambha pratyayeṣu san pratyakṣaḥ eva bhavati
sa svabhāva viśeṣaḥ
svabhāvaḥ sva sattā mātra prabhāvini sādhya dharme hetuḥ
yathā vṛkṣaḥ yam śiśapātvāt iti
yathā bahniḥ atra dhūmāt iti
atra dvau vastu sādhanau
ekaḥ pratiṣedha hetuḥ
svabhāva pratibandhe hi sati arthaḥ gamayet
tad apratibaddhasya tad avyabhicāra niyama abhāvāt
sa ca pratibandhaḥ sādhye rthe liṅgasya
vastutas tādātmyāt tad utpatteḥ ca
a tad svabhāvasya a tad utpatteḥ ca tatra apratibaddha svabhāva tvāt

original: 2/24 te ca tādātmyatadutpattī svabhāvakāryayoreveti tābhyāmeva vastusiddhiḥ /
analyzed: te ca tādātmya tad utpattī svabhāva kāryayoḥ eva iti tābhyām eva vastu siddhiḥ
pratiṣedha siddhiḥ api yathā uktāyāḥ eva anupalabdheḥ
sati vastuni tasyāḥ asambhavāt
anyathā ca anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpteṣu deśa kāla svabhāva viprakṛṣṭeṣu artheṣu ātma pratyakṣa nivṛtteḥ abhava niścaya abhāvāt
amūḍha smṛti saṃskārasya atītasya vartamānasya ca pratipattṛ pratyakṣasya nivṛttiḥ abhāva vyavahāra prasādhanī
tasyāḥ eva abhāva niścayāt
sā ca prayoga bhedāt ekādaśa prakārā
svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra dhūmaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdheḥ iti
kārya anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra apratibaddha sāmarthyāni dhūma kāraṇāni santi
dhūma abhāvāt iti
vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śiśapā
vṛkṣa abhāvāt iti
svabhāva viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śīta sparśaḥ vahneḥ iti
viruddha kārya upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra śīta sparśaḥ dhūmāt iti

original: 2/36 viruddhavyāptopalabdhiryathā- na dhruvabhāvī bhūtasyāpi bhāvasya vināśaḥ,
analyzed: viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ yathā na dhruva bhāvī bhūtasya api bhāvasya vināśaḥ
hetu antara apekṣaṇāt iti
kārya viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na iha apratilbaddha sāmarthyāni śīta kāraṇāni santi vahneḥ iti
vyāpaka viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na atra tuṣāraspaśaḥ vahneḥ iti
kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ yathā na atra dhūmaḥ vahni abhāvāt iti
kāraṇa viruddha upalabdhiḥ yathā na asya roma harṣa ādi viśeṣāḥ
sannihita dahana viśeṣa tvāt iti
kāraṇa viruddha kāya apilabdhiḥ yathā na roma harṣa ādi viśeṣa yukta puruṣāvān ayam pradeśaḥ dhūmāt iti

original: 2/42 ime sarve kāryānupalabdhyādayo daśānupalabdhiprayogāḥ svabhāvānupalabdhau saṃgrahamupayānti /
analyzed: ime sarve kārya anupalabdhi ādayaḥ daśa anupalabdhi prayogāḥ svabhāva anupalabdhau saṃgraham upayānti
pāramparyeṇa artha antara vidhi pratiṣedhābhyām prayoga bhede pi
prayoga darśana abhyāsāt svayam api evam vyavaccheda pratītiḥ bhavati sva arthe pi anumāne syāḥ prayoga nirdeśaḥ
sarvatra ca asyām abhāva vyavahāra sādhanyām anupalabdhau yeṣām svabhāva viruddha dīnām upalabdhyā
kāraṇa ādīnām anupalabdhyā ca pratiṣedhaḥ uktaḥ teṣām upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptānām veditavyā
anyeṣām virodha kārya kāraṇa bhāva asiddheḥ
viprakṛṣṭa viṣayā punar anupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣa anumāna nivṛtti lakṣaṇā saṃśaya hetuḥ
pramāṇa nivṛttau api artha abhāva asiddheḥ iti
iti dvitīyaḥ svārtha anumāna paricchedaḥ
tṛtīyaḥ parārtha anumāna paricchedaḥ
tri rūpa liṅga ākhyānam para artham anumānam
kāraṇe kārya upacārāt
tat dvividham
prayoga bhedāt
sādhamyavat vaidhamyavat ca
na anāyoḥ arthataḥ kaścid bhedaḥ
anyatra prayoga bhedāt

original: 3/8 tatra sādharmyavatprayogaḥ- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate so 'sad vyavahāraviṣayaḥ siddhaḥ /
analyzed: tatra sādharmyavat prayogaḥ yat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sat na upalabhyate saḥ sat vyavahāra viṣayaḥ siddhaḥ
yathā anyaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kaścid śaśaviṣāṇa ādiḥ

original: nopalabhyate ca kvacit pradeśaviśeṣe upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpo ghaṭa ityanupalabdhiprayogaḥ /
analyzed: na upalabhyate ca kvacid pradeśa viśeṣe upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti anupalabdhi prayogaḥ

original: 3/9 tathā svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ- yat sat tat sarvamanityam,
analyzed: tathā svabhāva hetoḥ prayogaḥ yat sat tat sarvam anityam
yathā ghaṭa ādiḥ iti śuddhasya svabhāva hetoḥ prayogaḥ
yat utpattimat tat anityam iti svabhāva bhūta dharma bhedena svabhāvasya prayogaḥ
yat kṛtakam tat anityam iti upādhi bhedena

original: 3/12 apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti /
analyzed: apekṣita para vyāpāraḥ hi bhāvaḥ svabhāva niṣpattau kṛtakaḥ iti
evam draṣṭavyāḥ

original: 3/14 sannutpattimān kṛtako vā śabda iti pakṣadharmopadarśanam /
analyzed: san utpattimān kṛtakaḥ vā śabdaḥ iti pakṣa dharma upadarśanam

original: 3/15 sarva ete sādhanadharmā yathāsvaṃ pramāṇaiḥ siddhasādhanadharmamātrānubandhe eva sādhyadharme 'vagantavyāḥ /
analyzed: sarve ete sādhana dharmāḥ yathāsvam pramāṇaiḥ siddha sādhana dharma mātra anubandhe eva sādhya dharme vagantavyāḥ
tasya eva tad svabhāva tvāt
svabhāvasya ca hetu tvāt
vastutas tayoḥ tādātmyam
tad niṣpattau aniṣpannasya tad svabhāva tva abhāvāt
vyabhicāra sambhavāt ca
kārya hetoḥ prayogaḥ yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ
yathā mahānasa ādau
asti ca iha dhūmaḥ iti

original: 3/22 ihāpi siddhe eva kāryakāraṇabhāve kāraṇe sādhye kāryaheturvaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: iha api siddhe eva kārya kāraṇa bhāve kāraṇe sādhye kārya hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: 3/23 vaidharmyavataḥ prayogaḥ- yat sadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eva /
analyzed: vaidharmyavataḥ prayogaḥ yat sat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam tat upalabhyate eva
yathā nīla ādi viśeṣaḥ
na ca evam iha upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya sataḥ upalabdhiḥ ghaṭasya iti anupalabdhi prayogaḥ
asati anitya tve
na asti sattvam utpattimat tvam kṛtaka tvam vā

original: saṃśca śabda utpattimān kṛtako veti svabhāvahetoḥ prayogaḥ /
analyzed: san ca śabdaḥ utpattimān kṛtakaḥ vā iti svabhāva hetoḥ prayogaḥ
asati agnau na bhavati eva dhūmaḥ

original: atra cāsti dhūma iti kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca asti dhūmaḥ iti kārya hetoḥ prayogaḥ
sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge rthāt vaidharmya gatiḥ iti
asati tasmin sādhyena hetoḥ anvaya abhāvāt
tathā vaidharmyeṇa api anvaya gatiḥ
asati tasmin sādhya abhāve hetu abhāvasya asiddheḥ
nahi svabhāva pratibandhe sati ekasya nivṛttau aparasya niyamena nivṛttiḥ
sa ca dvi prakāraḥ sarvasya tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ tad utpati lakṣaṇaḥ ca iti uktam

original: 3/32 tena hi nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho darśanīyaḥ /
analyzed: tena hi nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandhaḥ darśanīyaḥ
tasmāt nivṛtti vacanam ākṣipta pratibandha upadarśanam eva bhavati
yat ca pratibandha upadarśanam tat eva anvaya vacanam iti ekena api vākyena anvaya mukhena vyatireka mukhena

original: vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavatīti nāvaśayaṃ
analyzed: vā prayuktena sapakṣa asapakṣayoḥ liṅgasya sat asat tva khyāpanam kṛtam bhavati iti na avaśayam
vākya dvaya prayogaḥ
anupalabdhau api yat sat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam tat upalabhyate eva iti ukte
anupalabhyamānam tādṛśam asat iti pratīreḥ anvaya siddhiḥ
dvayoḥ api anayoḥ prayogayoḥ na avaśyam pakṣa nirdeśaḥ
yasmāt sādharmyavat prayoge pi yat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sat na upalabhyate
saḥ sat vayavahāra viṣayaḥ

original: nopalabhyate cātropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa ityukte sāmarthyādeva neha ghaṭa iti bhavati /
analyzed: na upalabhyate ca atra upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti ukte sāmarthyāt eva na iha ghaṭaḥ iti bhavati

original: 3/36 tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi- yaḥ sad vyavahāraviṣaya upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ sa upalabhyata eva /
analyzed: tathā vaidharmyavat prayoge pi yaḥ sat vyavahāra viṣayaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptaḥ saḥ upalabhyate eva

original: na tathātra tādṛśo ghaṭa upalabhyate- ityukte sāmarthyādeva neha sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti bhavati /
analyzed: na tathā atra tādṛśaḥ ghaṭaḥ upalabhyate iti ukte sāmarthyāt eva na iha sat vayavahāra viṣayaḥ iti bhavati
kīdṛśaḥ punar pakṣaḥ iti nirdeśyaḥ
sva rūpeṇa eva svayam iṣṭaḥ nirākṛtaḥ pakṣaḥ iti
svarūpeṇa iti sādhya tvena iṣṭaḥ
sva rūpeṇa eva iti sādhya tvena eva iṣṭaḥ na sādhana tvena api
yathā śabdasya anitya tve sādhye cākṣuṣa tvam hetuḥ

original: śabde 'siddhatvāt sādhyaṃ bhavatīti na punastadiha sādhyatvenaiveṣṭam,
analyzed: śabde siddha tvāt sādhyam bhavati iti na punar tat iha sādhya tvena eva iṣṭam
sādhana tvena api abhidhānāt
svayam iti vādinā
yaḥ tadā sādhanam āha
etena yadi api kvacid śāstre sthitaḥ sādhanam āha

original: tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame 'pi yastadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitu miṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ  #
analyzed: tad śāstra kāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇi aneka dharma abhyupagame yaḥ tadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayam sādhayitu miṣṭaḥ saḥ eva sādhyaḥ na itaraḥ iti uktam
bhavati

original: 3/45 iṣṭa iti yatrārthe vivādena sādhanamupanyastaṃ tasya siddhimicchatā so 'nukto 'pi vacanena sādhyo bhavati /
analyzed: iṣṭe iti yatra arthe vivādena sādhanam upanyastam tasya siddhim icchatā vacanena sādhyaḥ bhavati
tad adhikaraṇa tvāt vivādasya
yathā para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ saṅghāta tvāt śayana āsana ādi aṅga vat iti
atra ātma arthāḥ iti anuktau api ātmārtha tā eva sādhyā
tena na ukta mātram eva sādhyam iti uktam bhavati
anirākṛtaḥ iti etad lakṣaṇa yoge pi yaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ pi arthaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna pratīti sva vacanaiḥ nirākriyate
na sa pakṣaḥ iti pradarśana artham

original: 3/49 tatra pratyakṣanirākṛto yathā- aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti / (1)
analyzed: tatra pratyakṣa nirākṛtaḥ yathā aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti
anumāna nirākṛtaḥ yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti
pratīti nirākṛtaḥ yathā acandraḥ śaśī iti
sva vacana nirākṛtaḥ yathā na anumānam pramāṇam iti
iti catvāraḥ pakṣābhāsa nirākṛtāḥ bhavanti
evam siddhasya asiddhasya api sādhana tvena abhimatasya
svayam vādinā tadā sādhayitum aniṣṭasya
ukta mātrasya
nirākṛtasya ca sādhyaḥ iti

original: tenaiva svarūpeṇābhimato vādina iṣṭo 'nirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti pakṣalakṣaṇamanavadyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tena eva sva rūpeṇa abhimataḥ vādinaḥ iṣṭaḥ nirākṛtaḥ pakṣaḥ iti pakṣa lakṣaṇam anavadyam darśitam bhavati
tri rūpa liṅga ākhyānam parārtha anumānam iti uktam
tatra trayāṇām rūpāṇām ekasya api rūpasya an uktaḥ sādhana ābhāsaḥ
uktau api asiddhau sandehe vā pratipādya

original: 3/57 ekasya rūpasya dharmisambandhasyāsiddho sandehe vāsiddho hetvābhāsaḥ /
analyzed: ekasya rūpasya dharmi sambandhasya asiddhaḥ sandehe vā asiddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ
yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti sādhye cākṣuṣa tvam ubhaya asiddham
cetanāḥ taravaḥ iti sādhye sarva tvac apaharaṇe maraṇam prativādi asiddham
vijñāna indriya āyuḥ nirodha lakṣaṇasya maraṇasya anena abhyupagamāt
tasya ca taruṣu asambhavāt
acetanāḥ sukha ādayaḥ iti sādhye utpattimat tvam
anitya tvam sāṃkhyasya svayam vādinaḥ siddham
tathā svayam tad āśrayaṇasya vā sandehe siddhiḥ
yathā vāṣpa ādi bhāvena sandihyamānaḥ bhūta saṅghātaḥ gni siddhau upadiśyamānaḥ sandigdha asiddhaḥ
yathā iha nikuñje mayūraḥ kekāyitāt iti
tad āpāta deśa bhrame

original: 3/65 dharmyasiddhāvapyasiddhaḥ- yathā sarvagata ātmeti sādhye sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvam /
analyzed: dharmi asiddhau api asiddhaḥ yathā sarvagataḥ ātmā iti sādhye sarvatra upalabhyamāna guṇa tvam
tathā ekasya rūpasya a sapakṣe sattvasya siddhau anaikāntikaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ

original: 3/67 yathā śabdasyānityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatraikadeśe vā vartamānaḥ /
analyzed: yathā śabdasya anitya tva ādike dharme sādhye prameya tva ādikaḥ dharmaḥ sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ sarvatra eka deśe vā vartamānaḥ
tathā asya eva rūpasya sandehe pi anaikāntikaḥ eva

original: 3/69 yathāsarvajñaḥ kaścidvivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rājādimān veti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ /
analyzed: yathā a sarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ rājā ādimān vā iti sādhye vaktṛ tva ādikaḥ dharmaḥ sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttikaḥ
sarvajñaḥ vaktā na upalabhyate iti evamprakārasya anupalambhasya adṛśya ātma viṣaya tvena sandeha hetu tvāt
vaktṛ tva ādeḥ vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā

original: 3/71 vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayorvirodhābhāvācca yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa vaktā na bhavatītyadarśane 'pi vyatireko na sidhyanti, sandehāt /
analyzed: vaktṛ tva sarvajña tvayoḥ virodha abhāvāt ca yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa vaktā na bhavati iti adarśane vyatirekaḥ na sidhyanti sandehāt
dvividhaḥ hi padārthānām
avikala kāraṇasya bhavataḥ nyabhāve bhāvāt virodha gatiḥ
śīta uṣṇa sparśavat
paraspara parihāra sthita lakṣaṇa tayā vā bhāva abhāvavat

original: 3/76 sa ca dvividho 'pi virodho vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayorna sambhavati /
analyzed: sa ca dvividhaḥ virodhaḥ vaktṛ tva sarvajña tvayoḥ na sambhavati
na ca aviruddha vidheḥ anupalabdhau api abhāva gatiḥ
rāga ādīnām vacana ādeḥ ca kārya kāraṇa bhāva asiddheḥ
artha antarasya ca akāraṇasya nivṛttau na vacana ādeḥ nivṛttiḥ
iti sandigdha vyatirekaḥ na aikāntikaḥ vacana ādiḥ
dvayoḥ rūpayoḥ viparyaya siddhau viruddhaḥ
kayoḥ dvayoḥ
sapakṣe sattvasya
a sapakṣe ca asattvasya

original: yathā kṛtatvaṃ prayatnānantarīya katvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddho hetvābhāsaḥ /
analyzed: yathā kṛta tvam prayatna anantarīya ka tvam ca nitya tve sādhye viruddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ
anayoḥ sapakṣe sattvam
a sapakṣe ca sattvam iti viparyaya siddhiḥ
etau ca sādhya viparyaya sādhanāt viruddhau
nanu ca tṛtīyaḥ pīṣṭa vighāta kṛt viruddhaḥ
yathā para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ saṅghāta tvāt cayana āsana ādi aṅga vat iti
tad iṣṭa asaṃhata pārārthya viparyaya sādhanāt viruddhaḥ
saḥ iha kasmāt na uktaḥ
anayoḥ eva antarbhāvāt
na hi ayam ābhyām sādhya aviparyaya sādhana tvena bhidyate
nahi iṣṭa uktayoḥ sādhya tvena kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti
dvayoḥ rūpayoḥ ekasya asiddhau aparasya ca sandehe
yathā vīta rāgaḥ kaścid sarvajñaḥ vā
vaktṛ tvāt iti
vyatirekaḥ tra asiddhaḥ
sandigdhaḥ nvayaḥ
sarvajña vīta rāgayoḥ viprakarṣāt vacana ādeḥ tatra sattvam asattvam vā sandigdham
anayoḥ eva dvayoḥ rūpayoḥ sandehe na aikāntikaḥ
yathā sātmakam jīvat śarīram prāṇa ādimat tvāt iti

original: 3/98 na hi sātmakanirātmakābhyāmanyo rāśirasti yatrāyaṃ prāṇādirvarteta /
analyzed: na hi sātmaka nirātmakābhyām anyaḥ rāśiḥ asti yatra ayam prāṇa ādiḥ varteta
ātmanaḥ vṛtti vyavacchedābhyām sarva saṃgrahāt
na api anayoḥ ekatra vṛtti niścayaḥ
sa ātmaka tvena anātmaka tvena vā prasiddhe prāṇa ādeḥ asiddheḥ

original: 3/102 tasmājjīvaccharīrasambandhī prāṇādiḥ sātmakādanātmakācca sarvasmād vyāvṛttatvenāsiddhestābhyāṃ na vyatiricyate /
analyzed: tasmāt jīvat śarīra sambandhī prāṇa ādiḥ sātmakāt anātmakāt ca sarvasmāt vyāvṛtta tvena asiddheḥ tābhyām na vyatiricyate
na tatra anveti
eka ātmani api asiddheḥ
nā api sātmakāt anātmakāt ca tasya anvaya vyatirekayoḥ abhāva niścayaḥ
eka abhāva niścayasya apara bhāva niścaya nāntarīyaka tvāt
anvaya vyatirekayoḥ anyonya vyavacheda rūpa tvāt
tatas eva anvaya vyatirekayoḥ sandehāt anaikāntikaḥ
sādhya itarayoḥ atas niścaya abhāvāt

original: 3/109 evameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇāmekaikasya dvayordvayorvā rūpayorasiddhau sandehe vā yathāyogamasiddhaviruddhānaikāntikāstrayo hetvābhāsāḥ /
analyzed: evam eṣām trayāṇām rūpāṇām ekaikasya dvayoḥ dvayoḥ vā rūpayoḥ asiddhau sandehe vā yathāyogam asiddha viruddha anaikāntikāḥ trayaḥ hetvābhāsāḥ
viruddha avyabhicārī api saṃśaya hetuḥ uktaḥ
saḥ iha kasmāt na uktaḥ
anumāna viṣaye sambhavāt
na hi sambhavaḥ sti kārya sva svabhāvayoḥ ukta lakṣaṇayoḥ anupalambhasya ca viruddha tāyāḥ
na ca anyaḥ vyabhicārī
tasmāt avastu darśana bala pravṛttam āgama śrayam anumānam āśritva tad artha vicāreṣu viruddha avyabhicārī sādhana doṣaḥ uktaḥ
śāstra kārāṇām artheṣu bhrāntyā viparīta svabhāva upasaṃhāra sambhavāt
na hi asya sambhavaḥ yathā avasthita vastu sthitiṣu ātma kārya anupalambheṣu

original: 3/117 tatrodāharaṇam- yat sarvadeśasthitaiḥ svasambandhibhiryugapadabhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam /
analyzed: tatra udāharaṇam yat sarva deśa sthitaiḥ sva sambandhibhiḥ yugapad abhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam
yathākāśam
abhisambadhyate ca sarva deśa avasthitaiḥ sva sambandhibhiḥ yugapad sāmānyam iti
tad sambandhi svabhāva mātra anubandhinī tad deśa sannihita svabhāva tā

original: 3/119 na hi yo yatra nāsti sa taddeśamātmanā vyāpnotīti svabhāvahetuprayogaḥ /
analyzed: na hi yaḥ yatra na asti sa tad deśam ātmanā vyāpnoti iti svabhāva hetu prayogaḥ

original: 3/120 dvitīyo 'pi prayogaḥ- yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate na tat tatrāsti /
analyzed: dvitīyaḥ pi prayogaḥ yat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sat na upalabhyate na tat tatra asti
tat yathā kvacid avidyamānāḥ ghaṭaḥ
na upalabhyate ca upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sāmānyam vyakti antarāleṣu iti
ayam anupalambhaḥ svabhāvaḥ ca paraspara viruddha artha sādhanāt ekatra saṃśayam janayataḥ
tri rūpaḥ hetuḥ uktaḥ

original: tāvatā nārthapratītiriti napṛthagdṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayava kaścit /
analyzed: tāvatā na artha pratītiḥ iti na pṛthagdṛṣṭāntaḥ nāma sādhana avayava kaścid
tena na asya lakṣaṇam pṛthak ucyateḥ gatārtha tvāt

original: 3/122 hetoḥ sapakṣaḥ eva sattvamasapakṣācca sarvato vyāvṛtto rūpamuktamabhadena /
analyzed: hetoḥ sapakṣaḥ eva sattvam asapakṣāt ca sarvatas vyāvṛttaḥ rūpam uktam abhadena
punar viśeṣeṇa kārya svabhāvayoḥ ukta lakṣaṇayoḥ janma tanmātṛ anubandhaḥ daśanīyau uktau
tat ca darśayatā yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ

original: asatyagnau na kvacid dhūmā yathā mahānasetarayoḥ /
analyzed: asati agnau na kvacid dhūmāḥ yathā mahānasa itarayoḥ
yatra kṛtaka tvam tatra anitya tvam
anitya tva abhāve kṛtaka tva asambhavaḥ yathā ghaṭa ākāśayoḥ iti darśanīyam

original: na hyanyathā sapakṣavipakṣayāḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye daśayitum /
analyzed: na hi anyathā sapakṣa vipakṣayāḥ sat asat tve yathā ukta prakāre śakye daśayitum
tad kārya tā niyamaḥ kārya liṅgasya
svabhāva liṅgasya ca svabhāvena vyāptiḥ

original: asmiścārthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭāntā bhavatiḥ,
analyzed: asmin ca arthe darśite darśitaḥ eva dṛṣṭāntā bhavatiḥ
etāvat mātra rūpa tvāt tasya iti
etena eva dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ api nirastāḥ bhavanti
yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrta tvāt
karmavat paramāṇu vat ghaṭa vat iti
ete dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ sādhya sādhana dharma ubhaya avikalāḥ
tathā sandigdha sādhya dharma ādayaḥ ca
yathā rāga ādimān ayam vacanāt rathyā puruṣa vat
maraṇa dharmā ayam puruṣaḥ rāga ādimat tvāt rathyā puruṣa vat
asarvajñaḥ yaṃpuruṣaḥ
rāga ādimat tvāt rathyā puruṣa vat iti
pradarśita anvayaḥ ca
yathā yaḥ vaktā sa rāga ādimān
iṣṭapuruṣa vat
anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti
tathā viparīta anvayaḥ yat anityam tat kṛtakam iti
sādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ
vaidharmyeṇa api paramāṇu vat karma vat ākāśa vat iti sādhya ādi avyatirekiṇaḥ
tathā sandigdha sādhya vyatireka ādayaḥ
yathā asarvajñāḥ kapila ādayaḥ na āptāḥ vā avidyamāna sarvajña tā āpta tā liṅga bhuta pramāṇa atiśaya śāsana tvāt iti

original: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇam- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikamu padiṣṭavān /
analyzed: atra vaidharmya udāharaṇam yaḥ sarvajñaḥ āptaḥ vā sa jyotiḥ jñāna ādikam u padiṣṭavān
yathā ṛṣabha vardhamāna ādiḥ iti
tatra asarvajña tā anāpta tayoḥ sādhya dharmayoḥ sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ

original: 3/131 sandigdhasādhanavatireko yathā- na trayividā brāhmaṇe grāhyavacana kaścid vivikṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvāditi /
analyzed: sandigdha sādhanavat atirekaḥ yathā na trayī vidā brāhmaṇe kaścid vivikṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ rāga ādimat tvāt iti

original: atra vedharmyodāharaṇam- ye grāhyavacanā na te rāgādimantaḥ,
analyzed: atra vedharmya udāharaṇam ye grāhya vacanāḥ na te rāga ādimantaḥ
tat yathā gautama ādayaḥ dharma śāstrāṇām praṇetāraḥ iti
gautama ādibhyaḥ rāga ādimattvasya sādhana dharmasya vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā
sandigdha ubhaya vyatirekaḥ yathā avita rāgāḥ kapila ādayaḥ
parigraha agraha yogāt iti

original: atra vaidharmyaṇodāharanam- yo vītarāgo na tasya parigrahāgraha,
analyzed: atra yaḥ vīta rāgaḥ na tasya
yathā ṛṣabha ādeḥ iti
ṛṣabha ādeḥ avīta rāga tva parigraha agraha yogayoḥ sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ sandigdhaḥ vyatiraikaḥ
avyatirekaḥ yathā avīta rāgaḥ yam vaktṛ tvāt

original: vaidharmyeṇodāharaṇam - yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti, na sa vaktā /
analyzed: vaidharmyeṇa udāharaṇam yatra avīta rāga tvam na asti na sa vaktā
yathā upala khaṇḍe iti

original: yadyapyupalakhaṇḍādubhayaṃ vyāvṛtta tathāpi sarvo vītarāgo na vakteti vyāptyā vyatiraikāsiddheravyatirakaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api upala khaṇḍāt ubhayam tathā api sarvaḥ vīta rāgaḥ na vaktā iti vyāptyā

original: 3/134 apradarśitavyatireko yathā- anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādākāśavaditi vaidharmyeṇa /
analyzed: apradarśita vyatirekaḥ yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ākāśa vat iti vaidharmyeṇa
viparīta vyatirekaḥ yathā yat akṛtaka tat nityam bhavati iti

original: 3/136 na hyebhirdṛṣṭāntābhāsairhetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣo ca sarvatrāsattvameva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: na hi ebhiḥ dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaiḥ hetoḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇam sapakṣe eva sattvam ca sarvatra asattvam eva niścayena śakyam darśayitum viśeṣa lakṣaṇam
vā
tad artha āpattyā eṣām nirāsaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: 3/138 ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatādayaḥ sādhanadoṣā uktāsteṣāmudbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: ye pūrvam nyūna tā ādayaḥ sādhana doṣāḥ uktāḥ teṣām udbhāvanam dūṣaṇam
tena para iṣṭa artha siddhi pratibandhāt
dūṣaṇa ābhāsāḥ tu jātayaḥ
abhūta doṣa udbhāvanāni jātyuttaraṇī iti
iti tṛtīyaḥ parārtha anumāna paricchedaḥ
nyāyabindu prakaraṇam samāptam
